attributes.action: Charge everyone in the UK £1 for their prescriptions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have a flat charge of £1 for every prescription, no exemptions for anyone in the UK. This has to be fairer than the current system in use today.Everyone should be able to afford a £1 charge. In doing this there is no FRAUD against the tax payer, and no bias against the English.
